# ewc-slide



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name              | Description                                          |
| ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| `--align-content` | Align slide content - flex-start / flex-end / center |
| `--align-text`    | Align slide content - left / right / center          |
